name: 4-Color Taxi (itch)
description:
4-Color Taxi is a retro GameBoy styled game where you are a taxi driver trying to find passengers and bring them to their destination using their vague directions to find out where they want to be going!

Features:

  • Retro graphics with a maximum of 4 colors on the screen at the same time!
  • 20 different hand made levels of increasing difficulty!
  • Public leaderboard! Compete with the world!
  • Fun, simple controls that are hard to master!
  • Original Chiptune soundtracks by Joe Williamson!

Also available on Ouya, Amazon, GameStick and Windows Phone 8/8.1!
